recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.steps: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Guacamole
recipes.steps: Mash avocados, lime juice, and salt together in a medium bowl; mix in tomatoes, onion, cilantro, and garlic. Stir in cayenne pepper. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate for 1 hour for improved flavor.

recipes.title: Choc chip cookies
recipes.steps: 1. Beat the butter and sugars, then beat in the eggs and vanilla. 2. Dissolve the baking soda in hot water and add to the mixture. 3. Stir in the flour, chocolate chips, and walnuts. 4. Drop dough onto a prepared baking sheet. 5. Bake until the edges are golden brown.

recipes.title: Chocolate cake
recipes.steps: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C 2. Make the cake.

recipes.title: pizza
recipes.steps: make pizza base, spread ketchup over it, sprinkle cheese and pepperoni per own tastes
